subject: Colleges and Universities
Leukemia
Hockey, Ice
Bone Marrow
lead_paragraph: Jaden Schwartz and his N.H.L. teammates on Friday will help honor Mandi Schwartz, a former Yale hockey player who died of acute myeloid leukemia.
snippet: Jaden Schwartz and his N.H.L. teammates on Friday will help honor Mandi Schwartz, a former Yale hockey player who died of acute myeloid leukemia.
